You can create an WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex constructor.

WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex()1/2

            WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex QuantConnect.Indicators.WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex (
     decimal  limitMove,
   )

Initializes a new instance of the WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex class using the specified name.

Parameters
decimal limitMove A decimal representing the limit move value for the period.

Return

WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex - The new WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex indicator object.

            WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex QuantConnect.Indicators.WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex (
     string   name,
     decimal  limitMove,
   )

Initializes a new instance of the WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex class using the specified name.

Parameters
string name The name of this indicator.
decimal limitMove A decimal representing the limit move value for the period.

Return

WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex - The new WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex indicator object.

Definition at line 65 of file Indicators/WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.


private WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex _asi;

// In Initialize()
_asi = new WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex(name, limitMove);
_asi.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _asi, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_asi.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _asi.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.asi = WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex(name, limitMove)
self.asi.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.asi, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.asi.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.asi.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

    
private WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex _asi;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_asi = new WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex(limitMove);
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.Bars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _asi.Update(data.Bars[symbol]);
}
if (_asi.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _asi.Current.Value;
}
    
# In Initialize()
self.asi = WilderAccumulativeSwingIndex(limitMove)
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.Bars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.asi.Update(data.Bars[self.symbol])
if self.asi.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.asi.Current.Value
